channel.title: Creating a suggestion command
channel.description:
Adding a suggestion command ok well, i am not great with coding i get it, i can find codes, i can edit them to a point but i want to add a code that when yu do
::suggest (message)
no ( ) of course, it sends the message part to a file so lets say my name is bob bob: ::suggest you need to fix this npc in varrock i want to have a file in my server folder that is named suggestions, and i want the message to appear in that file so if i open it up it will show
bob: you need to fix this npc in varrock
thanks, any1 have any idea on how to do that
i got a 317 server

item.title: Creating a suggestion command
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

Do you have Allstar, Pi, delta?

Adding a suggestion command
ok well, i am not great with coding i get it, i can find codes, i can edit them to a point
